title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.64 - Hearings; reopening
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.64 - Hearings; reopening

State Regulations
(a) Motions for leave to reopen a hearing because of newly discovered evidence
shall be timely made. (b) The board
or a hearing officer may, in their discretion or on their own motion, reopen a
hearing and take further testimony at any time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.64

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
